question: Your friend had made a plan for you to see a movie together but you cannot now not join him. You’ve found another friend who can go instead of you.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Explain why you cannot go anymoreSay who can go instead of youSay why this person is a good person to go with
text: I was delighted to receive your letter and know how excited you are about our movie plan for the coming month. I am disheartened to let you know that I won’t be able to accompany you to Marvel’s film.

You already know that I am a diehard Marvel fan and always enthralled by seeing the heartthrob Iron Man from the Marvels. However, at ,work I have been suggested to undergo a training module, which has been scheduled for the next 60 days and I will be travelling to Pune for the same. This training will enhance my technical knowledge and it is cardinal for my job profile to climb the corporate ladder.

As we have already booked early bird tickets to avail a discount for this incredible show, you can take along my best friend Rahul with you. He is a cinema buff, moreover, he is dabbling in writing some movie blogs too. Apart from that, he is an extrovert, and I am sure you both will click together.
Let me know how you feel about going along with Rahul for the film.
